meanings.definition: A substance that can produce ions when dissolved in a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The ionogen mixed in the water created a solution full of charged particles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how ionogens interact with different solvents.
meanings.sent3: The ionogen decided to throw a party in the water, inviting all its ion friends.
meanings.sent4: The ionogen danced in the liquid, releasing its electric energy.
meanings.sent5: As the ionogen dissolved, it sparked a colorful display of ions in the solution.

meanings.definition: A compound that forms ions when subjected to an electric current.
meanings.sent1: When the electric current passed through the ionogen, it split into charged particles.
meanings.sent2: The ionogen reacted strongly to the electrical stimulation, releasing ions.
meanings.sent3: The ionogen felt like a superstar under the spotlight of the electric current.
meanings.sent4: The ionogen transformed into a glowing spectacle as the current flowed through.
meanings.sent5: The ionogen crackled with energy as it underwent ionization in the circuit.
